OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

rpc

  • 1.2.0
  • version 1.3.0
  • 1.3.1
  • 1.4.1
  • 1.5.0
Tags org:mirage and org:xapi-project
Maintainer thomas@gazagnaire.org
Dependencies ocamlfind & type_conv >= 108.07.01 & xmlm & js_of_ocaml
Last update Dec 19, 2013
Source https://github.com/samoht/ocaml-rpc/tarball/1.3.0
92b8d61f3d20be7d7bdcf3feaf0316e8

A library to deal with RPCs in OCaml

This library uses a camlp4 syntax extension to generate functions to convert values of a given type to and from their RPC representations. In order to do so, it is sufficient to add with rpc to the corresponding type definition.

Dependencies
js_of_ocaml
xmlm
type_conv ( >= 108.07.01 )
ocamlfind
Required by
xen-api-client
